price: 〔他〕是天地万物的主宰，是至仁的，他们不敢向他陈说。
arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-raḥmāni lā yamlikūna min'hu khiṭāban
